title: North End LOFT $2200... GREAT OPEN SPACE ~ 10 FT CEILINGS ~ 9/1/2022
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 234475356', 'Rent: $2,200 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'WE HAVE THE LARGEST EXCLUSIVE RENTAL INVENTORY IN THE NORTH END.', 'Core Property Group – 278 North Street Boston, MA 02113 - Open 7 Days a Week', 'MONEY DUE UP FRONT', 'FIRST MONTH: $2200', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:  $2200', 'BROKER FEE: $2200', 'NORTH END', 'Loft Studio in the North End', '$2200', '9/1/2022', 'AWESOME LOFT LAYOUT!!!!', 'Sunny Apt with Big Windows', 'BIGGER THAN MOST 1 BEDS', 'Full Separate Kitchen', 'Hardwood floors', 'Large Living Area', 'Big closets', 'Large Bathroom', 'Laundry in Building', 'Extra Storage', 'EASY TO SHOW - 7 DAYS A WEEK', '.', 'SALES...', 'Thinking of Buying or Selling??', 'Call today and LETS TALK.', ' I handle Condo & Multi Family Sales throughout the Downtown Boston Area.', '.', 'I mainly cover the North End, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, Downtown/Fidi, Seaport, South Boston, Charlestown & West End.', '.', 'Please contact Zach to Discuss ALL AVAILABILITY including OFF MARKET LISTINGS.', 'Please Call, Text, Email, or DM', 'Zach Barron', 'Core Property Group', 'Vice President', '617-939-1078', 'Instagram: @real_estate_barron', 'zbarron <URL>', '*** BROKERS:', 'THIS LISTING IS NOT A CO-BROKE ***', 'All Information should be verified.', 'The apartments advertised may be rented.', 'Core Property Group is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Company.']
